notes: These strong [[creatures]] are similar to [[Necromancer]]s. They can [[summon]] the [[undead]] as well.  {{JSpoiler|You may hunt 4000 of these along with [[Necromancer]]s, [[Blood Hand]]s, [[Blood Priest]]s and [[Shadow Pupil]]s as a [[Killing in the Name of... Quest/Spoiler#Unranked Tasks|task for Lugri]]. Upon completion of the task you will face [[Necropharus]]. The task can be repeated several times but only grants you 40,000 [[Experience|experience points]] from the second time and onwards.}}
name: Priestess
bestiarytext: Priestesses came to Edron together with the monks. They are also followers of the evil god Zathroth but they roam the dungeons instead of having a home. Like the monks, they will fiercely attack every intruder into their holy realm. They are weak fighters, but have a lot of magic abilities. They shoot magic missiles at their enemies and drain mana off them, summon ghouls as reinforcements, and heal themselves.
sounds: Now your life is come to the end, hahahaha!
Throw the soul on the altar!
location: [[Hero Cave]], [[Drefia]] ruins, [[Lich Hell]], [[Tombs]], [[Magician Quarter]] in [[Yalahar]], [[Vengoth|Vengoth Castle]], [[Hellgorge]].
strategy: If you are planning to use [[runes]], [[Explosion]]s are a good choice because Priestesses are weak to [[Physical Damage]]. Also, beware of the [[Mana Drain]] ability. [[Bronze Amulet]]s can be helpful if you're going to hunt them. A Priestess will drain an average of 100 [[mana]] per hit, which can be ''very'' annoying.
